addIngredientsPrompt: Add some ingredients to get started.
whatToCook: Know what you want to cook?
enterRecipeToFind: Enter a recipe name to find it.
saveRecipesPrompt: Save your favorite recipes here for easy access.
cacheWarningCookbook: Note: Your cookbook is saved in your browser's cache.
addApiKeyInSettings: Please add your Google AI API key in the settings.
enterRecipeName: Please enter a recipe name to search.
noRecipesFoundDescription: We couldn't find any recipes with those ingredients. Try adding more!
failedToGenerateRecipes: Failed to generate recipes. Please try again.
couldNotFindSurprise: Couldn't find a surprise recipe. Please try again.
failedToFindSurprise: Failed to get a surprise recipe.
canGoBack: You can go back to where you were.
failedToLoadRecipe: Failed to load recipe details. Please try again.
couldNotGenerateDescription: Could not generate description for this step.
failedToGetAdviceDescription: The AI couldn't provide advice at this time. Please try again.
apiKeyRequiredDescription: Please set your Google AI API key in the settings to use the app.
manageAllergensDescription: Select common allergens or add your own to filter recipes.
addIngredientsDesc: Search for an ingredient or select from the list below.
searchOrAdd: Search or add a custom ingredient...
manageSettings: Manage your app settings and preferences.
cacheWarningApiKey: Your key is stored only in your browser.
apiKeyRemovedDescription: Your API key has been removed.
confirmRemoveCookbook: This will permanently remove {{recipeName}} from your cookbook.
dontAskAgain: Don't ask me again for the next 5 days
createVariationDescription: Make changes to '{{recipeName}}' and generate a new version.
removeIngredientsDescription: Select any ingredients you'd like to exclude.
addAddonsDescription: List ingredients to add, separated by commas.
unavailableEquipmentDescription: Tell us what equipment you don't have, and we'll try to adapt the recipe.
noChangesRequestedDescription: Please select an ingredient to remove or add a new one.
couldNotCreateVariation: The AI could not create a viable variation with the requested changes.
troubleshootPlaceholder: e.g., 'My sauce is too thin', 'It's burning'
